description.@en: Predator or prey; to you, it makes no difference. From the simplest of creatures to the most unfamiliar beasts of a different age, they are all a creation of nature. In that, you have learned to bring them to heel, to speak with them and live among them as their friend.

effect.@en: For purposes of Skills, Magick and other interactions you have, treat creatures who are classified as Beasts instead as Animals. This means you can tame them, teach them tricks and ensorcell them with Magicks and Skills. Furthermore, when you fail a Handle Animal Test, you may re-roll to generate a better result, but must accept the outcome.
